title: Enable Porkbun API domain access and automate apex ALIAS update for buenahora.com
description: Porkbun API keys are valid but DNS endpoints return `Domain is not opted in to API access` for buenahora.com. Enable API access in Porkbun domain settings, then upsert apex ALIAS -> x25vb66a.up.railway.app via API.

title: Add playground CLI app package
description: Add apps/playground as a lightweight CLI workspace package for backend experimentation.

title: Remove organization context from Auth.js baseline
description: Drop orgId cookie usage and organization fields from tRPC/Auth context for consumer app setup.
close_reason: Removed org-specific context wiring from PR #6

title: Integrate Infisical for local and Railway env management
description: Use Infisical as the source of truth for app env vars in local development and Railway deployments. Add CLI wiring, required variables, and documentation.
close_reason: Implemented Infisical wrapper + docs; activation tracked in corphish-att-l7f

title: Set production Resend credentials for Railway web service
description: Configure AUTH_RESEND_KEY and a verified AUTH_RESEND_FROM in Railway production for web service, then validate end-to-end magic-link delivery.
notes: 2026-02-17: AUTH_RESEND_KEY is present in Infisical prod and app now injects 8 secrets at startup, but Resend API returns 401 validation_error: API key is invalid. Login still redirects to /api/auth/error?error=Configuration until key is replaced with a valid Resend API key.
close_reason: Set valid AUTH_RESEND_KEY in Infisical prod/dev. Railway runtime now injects 8 secrets. Resend flow succeeds for account email and redirects to verify-request; remaining restriction is Resend sandbox/domain verification for non-owner recipients.

title: Cleanup stale worktrees and start local Railway Postgres
description: Remove inactive bot worktrees and spin up local Postgres using railway dev generated compose stack.
close_reason: Removed unused worktrees; created/linked Railway project; added Postgres service; started local compose stack and verified DB query.

title: Enable public AuthJS signup and local Railway DB demo
Fix missing Auth.js/Prisma runtime deps for web build
description: Railway/local web production build fails with module-not-found for next-auth, @auth/prisma-adapter, @prisma/adapter-pg, and pg. Add correct package deps in workspace packages and verify build.
close_reason: Local node_modules were stale; lockfile/deps already correct

close_reason: Added GH_TOKEN docs to example.env and created local .env scaffold

title: Configure Porkbun DNS for Railway custom domain and store API keys in Infisical
description: Add Porkbun API credentials to Infisical and use them to configure Railway custom domain DNS records for buenahora.com.
close_reason: Completed: Porkbun creds stored in Infisical (dev/prod), Railway custom domain buenahora.com verified+active, production AUTH_URL/NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL moved to https://buenahora.com. Follow-up corphish-att-1ju tracks optional API-managed DNS update once domain API access is enabled.
